front.title: Booma
front.gametext: Deploy on your Fambaa. Twice per battle may draw destiny. If destiny < total number of opponent's characters and vehicles present, one of them is lost (opponent's choice).
front.lore: Launched from fambaa-mounted catapults. Gungan 'energy balls' are used to disable a variety of mechanized threats. Effectiveness is enhanced by the skill of the user.

combo: Booma + Big Boomers! Cancel and re-draw your weapon destiny.
